original_text: I will scatter you among the nations and disperse you through the countries, and I will consume your uncleanness out of you.
korean_text: 내가 너를 뭇 나라 가운데에 흩으며 각 나라에 헤치고 너의 더러운 것을 네 가운데에서 멸하리라

sentences.original_text: I will scatter you among the nations
and disperse you through the countries
and I will consume your uncleanness out of you.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너희 중에서 너희의 부정함을 제거하리라
